post:
**ChimpanzeeHost**
ChimpanzeeHost is a premier web hosting and cloud server provider. Our new tool makes it possible to select 100% custom specs for your server!

Try it now [ HERE
](https://chimpanzeehost.com/clientsarea/cart.php?a=add&pid=50 "
")
**LARGE NUMBER OF HIGH END CPUs AVAILABLE UP TO 56 CORES!**
A vast selection of high end CPUs, in order fulfil every project.
Intel Xeon-E 2136 - 6 c / 12 t - 3.3 GHz / 4.5 GHz
Intel Xeon E3-1230v6 - 4 c / 8 t - 3.5 GHz / 3.9 GHz
Intel i7-7700K - 4 c / 8 t - 4.2 GHz / 4.5 GHz
Intel Xeon E5-1650v4 - 6 c / 12 t - 3.6 GHz / 4 GHz
AMD Epyc 7351P - 16 c / 32 t - 2.4 GHz / 2.9 GHz
Intel i7-7700K - 4 c / 8 t - 4.2 GHz / 4.5 GHz
AMD Ryzen 5 3600X - 6 c / 12 t - 3.8 GHz / 4.4 GHz
Intel 2x Xeon Gold 6132 - 28 c / 56 t - 2.6 GHz / 3.7 GHz

**DDR4 RAM UP TO 512GB**
Ram is now more important than ever, so we are offering configurable servers with up to 512 GBs of RAM, so you'll never "run out".


**SSD NVMe DISKS**
When storage along with perfomance are important, there is only one way that even the most demanding one can be satisfied; The NVMe disks. They offer lighting fast speeds, along with stability and data security.

**MULTIPLE IP ADDRESSES**
Every cloud server can be equiped with up to 256 unique IPv4 addresses to fulfill any goal and operation!
Try it now [ HERE
](https://chimpanzeehost.com/clientsarea/cart.php?a=add&pid=50 "
")
